name: Corruo
description:
A bespoke power fantasy created by Hexe Fey for adc~ (Allison Connery)

What if white male privilege was a harvestable resource?

What if it could be made into a drug?

Download includes preliminary version released on philome.la, "director's cut" version, and an mp3 of "No Pet Shop Boy Can Stop Me Now", by adc~.

Corruo is free to play here: http://www.philome.la/spccstl/corruo

adc~ soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/adc-1
